name: Shutin Summoner
description:
I'm sad that I can't finish it. I clearly underestimated the scale of the project that I can make. as well alot of ups and downs to both the visual and coding side. But since this is my first game jam I'll just leave it here for me to remember how bad I am in the future.

Left click an item to pick up

Right click to drop

Left click on the circle to add item

Left click on the circle without holding an item to get the item in the circle

Space when near the circle to summon
